tool_description: EditBeam is an API that supports a range of video editing features, including the ability to add subtitles and audio to GIFs. With EditBeam, developers can easily integrate these features into their applications, enabling users to add captions, subtitles, and audio tracks to their GIFs with just a few simple clicks.
name: EditBeam
title: EditBeam

api_list.name: addSubtitleToVideo
addAudioToGif
